title: Svěžest zeugla (svitek)
content:
Svěžest zeugla

"Notes contain the formula for a potion made with zeugl venom. The potion grants 1 Silver and 1 Gold Talent when consumed."

Notes containing the formula for a potion made with Zeuglí jed.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Svěžest zeugla
